address: Xã Chiềng Sàng, Huyện Yên Châu, Tỉnh Sơn La
thought:
**Determining the New Ward for "Xã Chiềng Sàng"**

Okay, so I'm presented with the old address: "Xã Chiềng Sàng, Huyện Yên Châu, Tỉnh Sơn La". My task is to pinpoint the new administrative unit for this address.  First things first: I've got to identify the old ward, which is "Xã Chiềng Sàng," and the old province, "Tỉnh Sơn La." Contextually, I also know the district is "Huyện Yên Châu," although districts themselves aren't the focus of these changes.

Now, I'm diving into the resolutions.  I've cross-referenced "Tỉnh Sơn La" against the province resolutions (specifically 60-NQ/TW), and thankfully, it's listed as not undergoing any merger, so that's easy.

Next, I've meticulously combed through the other resolutions, specifically focusing on those related to "Sơn La."  Bingo! Resolution 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15 popped up, and it's gold for this case. Line 38 of this resolution clearly states the consolidation of multiple old wards, including "Chiềng Sàng", into a new ward called "xã Yên Châu." This is a definitive match!

With the new ward identified as "xã Yên Châu," I then cross-referenced that name with the available new ward data. Sure enough, "xã Yên Châu" appears under "Tỉnh Sơn La," and it provides a ward code of "04075."

Putting it all together, "Xã Chiềng Sàng" is definitely merged into "xã Yên Châu" based on resolution 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15. My confidence in this conclusion is high; we have a clear match and explicit instructions from the resolution.  The province of "Tỉnh Sơn La" is unaffected.  Therefore, my conclusion is that "Xã Chiềng Sàng" becomes part of the new ward, "Xã Yên Châu" with the code "04075."

citation.header: 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Sơn La
citation.line: 38. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Yên Châu và các xã Chiềng Đông, Chiềng Sàng, Chiềng Pằn, Chiềng Khoi, Sặp Vạt thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Yên Châu.
